original: Arfwidsson, Karl Daniel (Dan), direktör, Norrköping, f. 10/1/89 i Ölsremma, Älvsb. iL, av kyrkoh. Anders Arvid A. o. Alma Ahlenius. G. 20 m. Ninni Pettersson. — Avg:ex. fr. Schartaus handelsinst. 08. Tjänstem. i J. G. Swartz A-B i Norrköp. 13-17, kont:chef där 17-19, dir. där sed. 20 o. i Kvarn A-B J. G. S. ;sed. 28. V. ordf. i Riksbank, avd :kont. 44, handelskamm. 38. På sin tid främst, friidr :man. Innehar ett flertal idrotts!’, utmärkelser. Hobbies: sport, idrott.
translated: Arfwidsson, Karl Daniel (Dan), director, Norrköping, born January 10, 1889 in Ölsremma, Älvsborgs län, son of the vicar Anders Arvid A. and Alma Ahlenius. Married to Ninni Pettersson since 1920. Graduated from Schartau's School of Commerce in 1908. Employed at J. G. Swartz A-B in Norrköping from 1913-1917, became head of department from 1917-1919, and has been director there since 1920 as well as at Kvarn A-B J. G. S. since 1928. Vice chairman of Riksbank, department: kont. (accounting) in 1944 and trade chamber in 1938. A notable athlete of his time. Holds several sports honors. Hobbies: sports, athletics.

education.educationalCredentialAwarded: ex. from Schartau's School of Commerce
